definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Both countries are nuclear powers and are keenly aware that a conventional military conflict would not be easily contained.
sentences.chinese: 兩國都是核大國，都很清楚傳統的軍事衝突不易控制。

sentences.english: The Israelis are desperate to prevent Iran from becoming a nuclear power.
sentences.chinese: 以色列正不顧一切地阻止伊朗變成核大國。

sentences.english: Just think of what would happen if one nuclear power launched a preemptive on another.
sentences.chinese: 試想一下一個核大國先發制人會出現什麼情況。

sentences.english: That is our responsibility as the world's two leading nuclear powers.
sentences.chinese: 這是我們作爲全世界兩個核大國需要承擔的責任。
